name: The Case of the Lost Littles
name_original: The Case of the Lost Littles
description:
Jonathan J. Duck is a woodland detective. He's just hung up his shingle and is looking for business. He is called upon to find some missing woodland children. Will he find them in time? Play to find out.

To play, download the .html file and open in your browser of choice. From there,  click the links in blue to navigate through the story.
